text: If the relative with whom the child is living is found to be ineligible for assistance because of failure to comply with conditions of §§ 4-217.08 and 4-217.09, any aid for which such child is eligible (determined without regard to the needs of the ineligible relative) shall be provided in the form of protective or vendor payments.
historical:

1981 Ed., § 3-217.11.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.

DC CODE § 4-217.11

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Condition of eligibility--Protective or vendor payments.
